description.value: Whenever the Sister burns a Fate Point to survive a mortal bloe, each other friendly character who witnesses it regains 1 spent Fate Point.

system.benefit: Whenever the Sister burns a Fate Point to survive a mortal bloe, each other friendly character who witnesses it regains 1 spent Fate Point.

prerequisites.text: Tier 2: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Ceaseless Crusader, Shielding Faith.
